title: Bug 6304 - Unable to synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, the following issue occurs:
OB: The synchronization process fails when trying to synchronize a .java file with another resource.
EB: The synchronization process should successfully synchronize a .java file with another resource without any errors.
SR:
1. Open the project in the IDE.
2. Navigate to a .java file that needs synchronization.
3. Attempt to synchronize the .java file with another resource.
4. Observe the synchronization failure.
